title: Supplicant
summary: The Supplicant is a grotesque, parasitic creature that appears as a massive, engorged tick latched onto a desiccated human corpse.

title: Sycophant
summary: The Sycophant is a swift, insect-like Bloodsucker enemy. While not particularly tough or damaging, it excels in speed and evasion, capable of inflicting significant Stress and the Crimson Curse on its targets.
appearance: A large, black insect-like creature with a red underbelly, sharp claws, and translucent wings. Its body is segmented and ends in a pointed tail. The head features multiple eyes and mandibles.
